blogPost.excerpt: We made deepfake save simple and legal for you 🙂. So now you can have fun with this technology. Try more than 30 templates with 12 voices. Send to a friend a parody Merry Christmas greeting from celebrities 🤣🎉
blogPost.body: We made deepfake save simple and legal for you 🙂. So now you can have fun with this technology. Try more than 30 templates with 12 voices. Send to a friend a parody Merry Christmas greeting from celebrities 🤣🎉
blogPost.title: Deepfake Christmas Сongratulations - Send your loved ones a funny and unique video congratulation
blogPost.author: Vlad Sveshnikov

localize.description: 我们为你做了简单而合法的深度假拯救，🙂。所以现在你可以享受这项技术的乐趣了。尝试使用12种声音的30多个模板。向朋友发送名人🤣🎉的恶搞圣诞祝福
localize.tagline: 向你所爱的人发送一段有趣而独特的祝贺视频

localize.description: 我們爲你做了簡單而合法的深度假拯救，🙂。所以現在你可以享受這項技術的樂趣了。嘗試使用12種聲音的30多個模板。向朋友發送名人🤣🎉的惡搞聖誕祝福
localize.tagline: 向你所愛的人發送一段有趣而獨特的祝賀視頻

previous.excerpt: This is my first 3D illustration pack, I've prepared 15 3D hand gestures in cartoon style that can be used for user interfaces, social media posts, presentations, infographics and banners.
previous.title: 3D Hand Gestures - Cute hand gestures for your designs.

localize.description: 这是我的第一个3D插图包，我已经准备了15个卡通风格的3D手势，可以用于用户界面、社交媒体帖子、演示文稿、信息图表和横幅。
這是我的第一個3D插圖包，我已經準備了15個卡通風格的3D手勢，可以用於用戶界面、社交媒體帖子、演示文稿、信息圖表和橫幅。
